divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out the front door about 6:35 OUR door faces south.I noticed a really bright like star.AT first i thought it was an airplane coming up from the south,but the light was blinking and alot brighter than an airplanes light.I watched it closely it didnt seem to be moving.then at a really slow path it sarted moving north.then it started to like shake.and blinked and reappeared just alittle bit to the west.again it stayed in one spot for a few seconds blinking then again it kind of shook and disappeared from that spot and moved to the east of its original path.it then started a slow path to the north again blink a few more times then disappeard.i was amazed and at the way the object moved from one place to the next . it was awesome.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lake Oswego
There were no other sightings in Lake Oswego on or around November 19th 2011
Summary: bright star like object zig zags in night sky
